title: Alternative question mark
content:
I have a client whose brand guidelines dictates the use of Futura for body text (not my choice and can't be changed) - however they hate the question mark and want it replaced (clients hey?)

Can anyone suggest a replacement mark? Or should I just go ahead and try and re-draw one in a similar style...
author: TL

comments.content:

check out these threads:
